title: Hyperscale AI data centers: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
summary: In sprawling stretches of farmland and industrial parks, supersized buildings packed with racks of computers are springing up to fuel the AI race. title: Mechanistic interpretability: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
summary: Hundreds of millions of people now use chatbots every day. And yet the large language models that drive them are so complicated that nobody really understands what they are, how they work, or exactly what they can and can’t do—not even the people who build them. title: AI companions: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
summary: Chatbots are skilled at crafting sophisticated dialogue and mimicking empathetic behavior. They never get tired of chatting. It’s no wonder, then, that so many people now use them for companionship—forging friendships or even romantic relationships.  According to a study from the nonprofit Common Sense Media, 72% of US teenagers have used AI for companionship.
